title: Hourly premium: Hours code
content: This allows you to target "what types of hours?" take to calculate the premium.To find out your export codes, go to Pay > Export Pay> Export codes.Please refer to your payroll system and correct the Payroll> Export> Export Codes section if the information is not identical.Enter the correct numbers in the appropriate boxes,Save the configuration.For the full article on setting up the hourly premium, click here.Helpful?00Updated: 4 years ago Share :
